response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you, given its worth of $1,500,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price, aiming to make this acquisition as favorable as possible for both parties.

We propose to sell the product to you for $1,200,000, which represents a substantial discount compared to its intrinsic value. This offer not only allows you to secure an asset of immense worth but also ensures that you benefit from a considerable saving.

Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. We are confident that this product will meet your expectations and contribute significantly to your endeavors.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
